p: Two-thirds of the patients were male. The mean±SD age of studied recipients was 41.7±16.8 years. Fifty-four patients received the transplant from a deceased donor. All donors had negative antibodies against HCV. The median time in dialysis was 79 months; only one patient had clinical liver disease before the transplantation. This patient had HCV and HBV co-infection. Forty-four patients had HCV genotype 1.
